description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal by October 2024 Item 1, 5340, NSN: 5340-01-554-4144, Wheel, Caster Part No.: 1080-520Z-PP1B, NCAGE: 56833 Quantity: 100, Unit of Issue: Ea, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

**Reference Number:** cb-820-38219988

**Notice Number:** W8485-258178/A

**Publication Date:**  2024-05-09

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-10T14:00:00 (Amended 2024-05-15)

**Expected Contract commencement Date:** 2024-06-28

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

## Procurement Details

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the supply of **Industrial wheels**, as per the following specifications:

| Item No. | Product Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Wheel, Caster | 100 | Ea |

Part number: 1080-520Z-PP1B
NCAGE: 058653

**Note:** Due to the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic, it is recommended to submit bids electronically through the epost Connect service to avoid any disruptions.

**Language of Bid:** Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation number: W8485-258178/A
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Offer Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of opportunity: Global

## Tender Documents

* The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:
  + [Industrial wheels](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37876/w8485-258178.a---adm-001-wheel-caster-%28dates-%28en.pdf)
  + [Industrial wheels](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37876/w8485-258178.a---rfp-wheel-caster---canada-buys-%28en.pdf)

## Contact Information

* Name: MCpl Poissant-Viau, Audrée
* Email: audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 00 00 00 00
* Fax: None
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

Please submit your bids electronically to ensure timely delivery and to minimize disruptions. If you have any further questions or concerns,
